1.instruction: Clone and analyze the e-commerce website from https://github.com/csphi/E-Commerce-Site-Development and the Magpie Node.js integration from https://github.com/magpieimdev/magpie-node. Integrate the Magpie payment system with the provided API credentials (Publishable key: pk_live_8AHuOrO1OrQkqWSxtZvMZP, Secret key: sk_live_BEvI0LOMtYOv96dbq4Z91y) to enable Alipay and WeChat Pay acceptance. Configure the application for deployment on Render platform with all necessary environment variables and deployment configurations. Ensure the payment integration is fully functional and secure.
